scripts.test:dev: set ENV=dev&& npx bddgen && npx playwright test
scripts.test:staging: set ENV=staging&& npx bddgen && npx playwright test
scripts.clean: npx rimraf test-results playwright-report .features-gen allure-results allure-report logs error.log
scripts.allure:clear: if exist allure-results (rd /s /q allure-results) && if exist allure-report (rd /s /q allure-report)
